TopicTitle: Cod McTrout, the greatest Fish-Man on Kerbin

Articles.Content: Hello to all of my fellow Pilots and spacefaring Hamsters. My name is Cod McTrout, and I'm founder to the Gerbal Space Program, a system to get hamsters, ferrets, and other rodents into space. The program hasn't had much progress, but I, Cod McTrout, shall do my duty.
Ha make sure they don't nibble any wires!
